title: Problem with pip installation on Ubuntu 14.04
body_html:
Hi,
The newset version of pytorch is not working with wheel and pip on ubuntu 14.04 and cuda 7.5. The following error occurs:

torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.

Thanks
-Saeed

body:
Hi, 
The newset version of pytorch is not working with wheel and pip on ubuntu 14.04 and cuda 7.5. The following error occurs:

torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.

Thanks
-Saeed
